abilities.name: Tough Hide
abilities.details: Baal stores a portion of damage taken and [bf]heals[/] back a percentage of it when out of combat.

abilities.name: Oxen Force
abilities.details: Baal's next three basic attacks release a shockwave in a small cone-shaped area, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [hp]maximum health[/]) to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Wild Trample
abilities.details: Baal slams down his foot to the ground, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [hp]maximum health[/]) to all nearby enemies and [db]slowing[/] them for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Bull Rush
abilities.details: Baal charges forward, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [hp]maximum health[/]) to all enemies hit.[n]If Baal hits an enemy hero, Bull Rush will stop and [db]fling[/] the target backward.[n]If Baal hits small monsters and minions, Bull Rush will knock them aside instead.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Force
abilities.details: Baal becomes unstoppable for a few seconds, [bf]reducing all incoming damage[/] by a percentage and becoming [bf]immune to all crowd controls[/].[n]Using Unstoppable Force will also break out from any form of crowd control he is currently in.[n]Using Bull Rush during Unstoppable Force will be charging in the direction of the cursor instead and will not stop until hitting either an enemy hero or a terrain.
